DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether low-density lipoprotein ( LDL-C ) lower Evolocumab ( AMG 145 ) result great change baseline percent atheroma volume ( PAV ) week 78 placebo subject coronary artery disease take lipid lower therapy .
DOC.brief_title: GLobal Assessment Plaque reGression With PCSK9 antibOdy Measured intraVascular Ultrasound
DOC.criteria: Clinical indication coronary angiography Subjects already take statin therapy , niacin ezetimibe screen must stable dose least 4 week prior screen LDLC . Subjects take lipidregulating therapy must enter study via lipid stabilization period . Subjects intolerant statin must meet statin intolerance entry criterion Fasting LDLC ≥ 80 mg/dL ( 2.07 mmol/L ) without additional risk factor , , LDLC ≥ 60 < 80 mg/dL ( 1.552.07 mmol/L ) presence one major three minor risk factor Subjects must meet follow criterion qualify coronary catheterization procedure : Evidence coronary heart disease ( least one lesion native coronary artery > 20 % reduction lumen diameter ) prior PCI Left main coronary artery < 50 % reduction lumen diameter visual estimation Target Coronary Artery IVUS must accessible IVUS catheter , must > 50 % reduction lumen diameter within target segment ( least 40mm length ) ; undergone prior PCI CABG candidate intervention next 18 month . It may bypass graft , bypass vessel culprit vessel previous MI . Coronary artery bypass graft surgery < 6 week prior qualify IVUS NYHA III IV heart failure , last known leave ventricular ejection fraction le 30 % Uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia control medication 3 month prior randomization Known hemorrhagic stroke Uncontrolled hypertension randomization Fasting Triglycerides ≥ 400 mg/dL ( 4.5 mmol/L ) screen Type 1 diabetes poorly control type 2 diabetes ( HbA1c > 9 % ) screening . Moderate severe renal dysfunction ( eGFR < 30 ml/min/1.73m2 ) screening .
